mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wifimac ( ID, CMAC, SMAC, DMAC, ZZLX, FZLX, XD, XXQD, RDMC, ZDSFXM, ISLYQ ) VALUES ( null, #{CMAC,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{SMAC,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{DMAC,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{ZZLX,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{FZLX,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{XD,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{XXQD,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{RDMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{ZDSFXM,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String}, #{ISLYQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=String})
